tweets.full_text:
Byterover works exactly like Git. You push your local context to a remote workspace, and your teammates pull it down with "brv pull"

Everyone works from the same source of truth, whether they're using Cursor, Windsurf, or Claude Code.

Check it out here: https://t.co/8STwQDNPo6

tweets.full_text:
Agentic memory framework for LLMs and AI Agents!

MemU is an open-source agent memory framework that lets LLMs store, organize, and reason over long-term memory using a file-system based design.

Instead of stuffing context or relying only on vector search, MemU lets agents read https://t.co/2ioFm1nj0O
